title: robofleet-dashboard
description: Robofleet-Dashboard is a web-based interface built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS designed to visualize and interact with data from the Robofleet robotics platform. This project provides a user-friendly dashboard for monitoring robot status, reviewing sensor data, and potentially controlling robot actions, offering a comprehensive overview and management tool for Robofleet-connected robots.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX source code for my resume, alongside an HTML version for easier online viewing. It serves as a showcase project for my skills and experience, utilizing TeX for precise formatting and HTML for web accessibility, covering the project topic of resume creation and personal branding.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, it provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS logs, aiding in debugging and understanding robot behavior. This project offers a practical solution for ROS developers to effectively manage and interpret log data.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML designed to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. It allows users to input their sleep schedule and track the cumulative difference between their desired and actual sleep hours, providing insights into their sleep patterns. This project serves as a practical application of TypeScript and modern web development techniques for personal well-being.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a modern web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, serving as a practical project demonstrating dashboard creation and best practices in front-end development. This repository showcases a functional dashboard interface, offering a valuable resource for learning and implementing robust, type-safe web applications with a focus on project-based learning.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project built with TypeScript and JavaScript focused on [Assuming from the name: potentially a monitoring tool or a specific application, tailor this based on your actual understanding]. It aims to [State the project's main goal/functionality]. The repository explores concepts related to project development and leverages modern web technologies to achieve its objectives. You can find the source code and further details at [https://github.com/aayushsiwa/raven-v2](https://github.com/aayushsiwa/raven-v2).

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a dynamic web application built with TypeScript, Vite, and Express.js that leverages the Gemini API to provide users with engaging and interactive AI-powered conversations. This project demonstrates the integration of modern web technologies for building a responsive and feature-rich interface, utilizing CSS, HTML, and JavaScript for front-end development and TypeScript for robust back-end logic. It showcases a practical application of the Gemini API within a full-stack project.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack project management application built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI), utilizing the pages router. This repository serves as a comprehensive example of building a modern web application, showcasing best practices with React Query for efficient data fetching and state management, alongside well-structured TypeScript code. It aims to provide a functional and aesthetically pleasing devboard that combines productivity and organization for software development projects.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a web-based project idea management tool built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for brainstorming, organizing, and prioritizing project ideas, enabling users to efficiently track their creative process from inception to execution.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository contains a collection of Jupyter Notebook projects implemented in Python, focused on various finance-related topics. It explores financial analysis and modeling using Python libraries, providing practical examples and code snippets for learning and experimenting with financial concepts. It's a great resource for anyone looking to apply Python to solve real-world finance problems.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack voting application built using Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows users to create and participate in polls, offering a streamlined and intuitive voting experience. Leveraging modern web technologies, next-voting showcases a practical application of front-end and back-end integration within the Next.js framework.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project built using HTML and Python to visualize geographical data on interactive maps. This repository provides tools and scripts for creating compelling map-based visualizations, allowing users to explore and analyze location-based information effectively.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a full-stack CRUD application built with Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting. This project demonstrates a practical implementation of core web development concepts and provides a foundation for building more complex applications. It showcases how to interact with a database, handle user input, and present data through a user-friendly interface.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: The `dynamic-event-calendar` repository houses a JavaScript-based project focused on creating a customizable and interactive event calendar. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this project aims to provide a dynamic interface for displaying and managing events, allowing for easy integration and customization for various applications. This calendar offers a flexible solution for visualizing schedules and event information.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository contains a modern, full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS for tracking IoT assets. Leveraging a serverless architecture, this project provides a user-friendly interface to manage and monitor asset location data, showcasing best practices for developing performant and scalable IoT solutions.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a project showcasing front-end development skills using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This repository implements interactive elements and dynamic content manipulation, focusing on practical application and demonstrating proficiency in modern web technologies. It serves as a portfolio piece highlighting project-based learning and front-end development capabilities.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a full-stack e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 (using the Pages Router), TypeScript, and React, leveraging Material UI (MUI) for a responsive and intuitive user interface. This project demonstrates modern web development practices, utilizing React Query for efficient data fetching and state management, and emphasizes strong typing throughout the codebase. It serves as a practical example of building a complete e-commerce solution, showcasing product browsing, shopping cart functionality, and a robust type-safe architecture.
